titles.title: Public Official Accountability Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide increased imprisonment for certain offenses by public officials.
Public Official Accountability Act

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: Public Official Accountability Act - Amends the federal criminal code to provide for a two-year increase in the prison sentence of public officials convicted of any crime: (1) committed during the course of official duty and intended to enrich such officials; and (2) involving bribery, fraud, extortion, or theft of public funds greater than $10,000.
